Trade/Device Name(s): PTS PANELS Chol+Glu Test Panel System
PTS PANELS Lipid Panel Test System
PTS PANELS HDL Cholesterol Test System
PTS PANELS CHOL+HDL Panel Test System
PTS PANELS CHOL+HDL+GLU Panel Test System
PTS PANELS Metabolic Chemistry Panel Test System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BioScanner Plus Glucose and multiple PTS PANELS Test Systems for measuring glucose, cholesterol, HDL cholesterol, and triglycerides using reflectance photometry on CardioChek analyzer
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative determination of glucose, cholesterol, HDL cholesterol, and triglycerides in human whole blood or fingerstick whole blood by healthcare professionals or individuals with diabetes for the diagnosis and management of carbohydrate and lipid metabolism disorders
